customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"A lively game of cards can not only release tension but also sooth wounded spirits..." As Maruf opens his Casket of Tomes, a deck comprised of "Electro Hypostasis," "Kujou Sara," and "Abyss Lector: Fathomless Flames" is revealed.
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: Instead of using your own deck, you will be using "Surprise Deck: Vital Flow" to engage in this challenge.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Electro Hypostasis
customize.desc:
Electro Hypostasis

Code name: Aleph. A high-purity Electro entity.

Even if you win at rock-paper-scissors, Aleph is not one to admit defeat.

customize.name: Kujou Sara
customize.desc:
"Crowfeather Kaburaya" Kujou Sara

"This is an act of righteousness."

customize.name: Abyss Lector: Fathomless Flames
customize.desc:
Abyss Lector: Fathomless Flames

From chapters of canon revealed comes much heeded admonishments.

customize.name: Nahida
customize.desc:
"Physic of Purity" Nahida

The panacea brings purity, and from the palace depths is spring renewed.

customize.name: Kujou Sara
customize.desc:
"Crowfeather Kaburaya" Kujou Sara

"This is an act of righteousness."

customize.name: Mona
customize.desc:
"Astral Reflection" Mona

Victory or defeat — it has all been written in the stars.

customize.name: The Seed of Stored Knowledge
customize.desc:
Nahida: The Seed of Stored Knowledge

"Share in my knowledge."

customize.name: The Seed of Stored Knowledge
customize.desc:
Nahida: The Seed of Stored Knowledge

"Share in my knowledge."

customize.name: A Thousand Floating Dreams
customize.desc:
A Thousand Nights' Dawnsong: A Thousand Floating Dreams

"There is an appointed time for all things to live and die, just like the ceaseless cycles of night and dawn."

"May the stories within this lamp grant you dreams worth looking forward to."

customize.name: A Thousand Floating Dreams
customize.desc:
A Thousand Nights' Dawnsong: A Thousand Floating Dreams

"There is an appointed time for all things to live and die, just like the ceaseless cycles of night and dawn."

"May the stories within this lamp grant you dreams worth looking forward to."

customize.name: Timaeus
customize.desc:
Timaeus, Scholar of Alchemy

"Hello there… Oh, you'd like to use the Crafting Bench? Sure, be my guest."

customize.name: Timaeus
customize.desc:
Timaeus, Scholar of Alchemy

"Hello there… Oh, you'd like to use the Crafting Bench? Sure, be my guest."

customize.name: Liben
customize.desc:
"Marvelous Merchandise" Liben

Big things are about to happen, big things! Oh, and I have an excellent business proposition for you, so, if I could just have a moment of your time?

customize.name: Rana
customize.desc:
Gem of Remembrance: Rana

"We still have a lot of time with each other. We can explore the vastness of the forest, the world, and the future together."

customize.name: Rana
customize.desc:
Gem of Remembrance: Rana

"We still have a lot of time with each other. We can explore the vastness of the forest, the world, and the future together."

customize.name: Red Feather Fan
customize.desc:
Ineffable Breeze: Red Feather Fan

Legend has it that this fan is capable of unleashing various effects in the hands of a tengu warrior.

But in the hands of an ordinary person, it only possesses the power to "make one's body lighter."

Even so, this degree of power is more than useful for the average individual.

customize.name: Red Feather Fan
customize.desc:

customize.name: Treasure-Seeking Seelie
customize.desc:
Revelation's Potential: Treasure-Seeking Seelie

Strange Seelie capable of guiding people toward treasure. Legend has it that some individuals know how to communicate with these Seelie...

customize.name: Treasure-Seeking Seelie
customize.desc:
Revelation's Potential: Treasure-Seeking Seelie

Strange Seelie capable of guiding people toward treasure. Legend has it that some individuals know how to communicate with these Seelie...

customize.name: Tandoori Roast Chicken
customize.desc:
Tandoori Roast Chicken

The chicken and spices are capable of performing a mysterious Sumeru dance on the tip of your tongue, evoking the image of a festive banquet...

But even a dish so delicious has its last bite, and every feast has its end.

customize.name: Tandoori Roast Chicken

customize.name: Butter Crab
customize.desc:
Butter Crab

The butter-infused crab legs have a rich aroma that washes over the taste buds so seductively that none can resist its allure.

"Another helping, please!"

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>
